comments.body: These aren't necessarily true.  Maybe we should have a reference to the scroll behavior so we can read the proper values?  Specifically, there are many cases where the min scroll offset isn't zero.

If the ScrollableListPainter exposed the ScrollBehavior these methods would be simple wrappers. If it's OK with you I'd like to make that (ScrollableList API) change in a separate PR. We'll also need a way to ensure that the painter's scrollOffset is always up to date.  See https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/3144
